name: NRSectorCarrier
description: NR Sector Carrier resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: configuredMaxTxPower
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Maximum transmit power for all downlink channels in a cell totaled together

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: arfcnDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number (NR-ARFCN) for downlink

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: arfcnUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number (NR-ARFCN) for uplink

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: bSChannelBwDL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: BS Channel bandwidth in MHz for downlink (3GPP 38.104 clause 5.3)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: bSChannelBwUL
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: BS Channel bandwidth in MHz for uplink (3GPP 38.104 clause 5.3)
